info.title: CubeSERV WFS - Foundation (oradb)
info.description: WFS-compliant web record server by CubeWerx Inc.

get.summary: The landing page of the API.
get.description: The landing page provides links to the API definition, links to the conformance statment, links to catalogues metadata and links to other resources offered by the service.

parameters.name: f
parameters.description: A MIME type indicating the representation of the resources to be presented (e.g. application/gml+xml; version=3.2 for GML 3.2).

200.description: The landing page encoded as JSON.

default.description: The landing page encoded as XML.

parameters.name: f
parameters.description: A MIME type indicating the representation of the resources to be presented (e.g. application/gml+xml; version=3.2 for GML 3.2).

parameters.description: A MIME type indicating the representation of the resources to be presented.

f.name: f
f.description: A MIME type indicating the representation of the resources to be presented (e.g. application/gml+xml; version=3.2 for GML 3.2).

f-map.name: f
f-map.description: A MIME type indicating the representation of the resources to be presented (e.g. application/gml+xml; version=3.2 for GML 3.2).

offset.name: offset
offset.description: The optional startIndex parameter indicates the index within the result set from which the server shall begin presenting results in the response document.

limit.name: limit
limit.description:
The optional limit parameter limits the number of records that are presented in the response document.  Only records are counted that are on the first level of the collection in
the response document. Nested objects contained within the explicitly requested records shall not be counted.

bbox.name: bbox
bbox.description: Only records that have a geometry that intersects the bounding box are selected. The bounding box is provided as four or six numbers, depending on whether the coordinate reference system includes a vertical axis (elevation or depth): * Lower left corner, coordinate axis 1 * Lower left corner, coordinate axis 2 * Lower left corner, coordinate axis 3 (optional) * Upper right corner, coordinate axis 1 * Upper right corner, coordinate axis 2 * Upper right corner, coordinate axis 3 (optional) The coordinate reference system of the values is WGS84 longitude/latitude (http://www.opengis.net/def/crs/OGC/1.3/CRS84) unless a different coordinate reference system is specified in the parameter `bbox-crs`. For WGS84 longitude/latitude the values are in most cases the sequence of minimum longitude, minimum latitude, maximum longitude and maximum latitude. However, in cases where the box spans the antimeridian the first value (west-most box edge) is larger than the third value (east-most box edge). If a record has multiple spatial geometry properties, it is the decision of the server whether only a single spatial geometry property is used to determine the extent or all relevant geometries.

time.name: time
time.description: Temporal constraint to be applied to a query; may be a time instance or a temporal period as per ISO8601.

tRelation.name: tRelation
tRelation.description: Temporal operator to use for temporal contstraint

propertyName.name: propertyName
propertyName.description: A list of record properties to include in the response.  For some output formats, such as XML that can be validate against a formal schema, this list represents the optional properties to include in the response.

coordPrecision.name: coordPrecision
coordPrecision.description: Number of digits after the decimal point to use when presenting result in a text-base output format such as XML or JSON

responseHandler.name: responseHandler
responseHandler.description: Tiggers asynchronous processing of the request; notification is sent to the endpoint specified as the value of the parameter.

crs.name: crs
crs.description: Asserts the CRS to use for encoding records in the response document.

filter.name: filter
filter.description: A query filter specified is some predicate encoding language supported by the server

filter_language.name: filter_language
filter_language.description: An identifier indicating the predicate language used to express the value of the "filter" parameter

q.name: q
q.description: A space seperated list of search terms to be applied to text fields in a record.

geometry.name: geometry
geometry.description: The geometry of an area of interest specified using WKT.

geometry_crs.name: geometry_crs
geometry_crs.description: The CRS used to encode the coordinates of the "geometry" parameter.

gRelation.name: gRelation
gRelation.description: The spatial operator to apply when testing a record's geometry against the area of interest encoded using the "geometry" parameter.

lat.name: lat
lat.description: The latitude of the center point of a proximity search.

lon.name: lon
lon.description: The longitude of the center point of a proximity search.

radius.name: radius
radius.description: The search radius in meters of a proximity search.

style.name: style
style.description: Named style to apply to map.

width.name: width
width.description: Width of output map in pixels.

height.name: height
height.description: Height of output map in pixels.

transparent.name: transparent
transparent.description: Flag indicating whether the map should be transparent or not.

recordId.name: recordId
recordId.description: Locate identifier for a specific record.

themeId.name: themeId
themeId.description: Name of a theme offered by the service

catalogueId.name: catalogueId
catalogueId.description: Identifier of a catalogue offered by the service

crs.description: Coordinate reference system of the coordinates in the spatial extent (property `spatial`).

spatial.description: West, north, east, south edges of the spatial extent.

trs.description: Temporal reference systems for the coordinates in the temporal extent.

temporal.description: Start time/end time of temporal extext.
